name: @ethanresnick/chai-jest-snapshot
description: Chai assertion that provides Jest's snapshot testing

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && babel src --out-dir dist && cp index.d.ts dist
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run mocha
scripts.example_1:watch: npm run build && cd examples && npm run example_1:watch
scripts.example_2:watch: npm run build && cd examples && npm run example_2:watch
scripts.example_3:watch: npm run build && cd examples && npm run example_3:watch
scripts.example_4:watch: npm run build && cd examples && npm run example_4:watch
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run mocha && npm run examples

author: Lily Skye <me@suchipi.com> (http://suchipi.com)
